info.title: FormForge RAG WebSocket API

joinUploadRoom.description: Channel for joining an upload room to receive notifications for a specific upload. Server creates a room named 'upload:{uploadId}'.

joinUploadRoomMessage.name: JoinUploadRoom Message
joinUploadRoomMessage.description: The unique upload ID string that identifies which upload room to join

payload.description: The unique upload ID (server will prepend 'upload:' to create the room name)

leaveUploadRoom.description: Channel for leaving an upload room to stop receiving notifications. Leaves the room named 'upload:{uploadId}'.

leaveUploadRoomMessage.name: LeaveUploadRoom Message
leaveUploadRoomMessage.description: The unique upload ID string that identifies which upload room to leave

payload.description: The unique upload ID (server will prepend 'upload:' to match the room name)

disconnectMessage.name: Disconnect Message
disconnectMessage.description: Message for the disconnect event. No payload is needed for this event.

uploadProgress.description: Channel for receiving real-time upload progress updates. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room.

uploadProgressMessage.name: UploadProgress Message
uploadProgressMessage.description: Contains information about the current progress of an upload

bytesReceived.description: Number of bytes received so far

bytesExpected.description: Total number of bytes expected for the complete upload

completed.description: Whether the upload has completed (will be false during progress events)

uploadComplete.description: Channel for receiving upload completion notifications. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room.

uploadCompleteMessage.name: UploadComplete Message
uploadCompleteMessage.description: Contains information about a completed upload including processing results

message.example: File uploaded successfully and ready for processing

uploadError.description: Channel for receiving upload error notifications. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room.

uploadErrorMessage.name: UploadError Message
uploadErrorMessage.description: Contains error information about a failed upload

processingStart.description: Channel for receiving file processing start notifications. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room when processing begins.

processingStartMessage.name: ProcessingStart Message
processingStartMessage.description: Contains information about the start of file processing

processingId.description: Unique ID for this processing job

totalFiles.description: Total number of files to be processed

files.description: List of files that will be processed

processingProgress.description: Channel for receiving file processing progress updates. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room.

processingProgressMessage.name: ProcessingProgress Message
processingProgressMessage.description: Contains information about the current progress of file processing

processingId.description: Unique ID for this processing job

currentFile.description: Name of the file currently being processed (null when between files)

fileId.description: ID of the file currently being processed (null when between files)

processedFiles.description: Number of files processed so far

totalFiles.description: Total number of files to process

processingComplete.description: Channel for receiving file processing completion notifications. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room.

processingCompleteMessage.name: ProcessingComplete Message
processingCompleteMessage.description: Contains information about completed file processing, including chunk statistics

processingId.description: Unique ID for this processing job

totalChunks.description: Total number of text chunks created

results.description: Detailed results for each processed file

chunks.description: Number of chunks created for this file

totalCharacters.description: Number of characters in this file

processingError.description: Channel for receiving file processing error notifications. Events are emitted to the 'upload:{uploadId}' room.

processingErrorMessage.name: ProcessingError Message
processingErrorMessage.description: Contains error information about a failed processing job

processingId.description: Unique ID for this processing job

fileId.description: ID of the file that failed to process (if applicable)

filename.description: Name of the file that failed to process (if applicable)

error.example: Failed to extract text from PDF

socketIoAuth.description: Socket.IO allows connection authentication through query parameters or headers
